articles.author: Casey Hall, Ben Blanchard
articles.title: China launches drills around Taiwan in angry response to VP's US trip - Reuters
articles.description: China launched military drills around Taiwan on Saturday as a "serious warning" to separatist forces in an angry but widely expected response to Vice Pres…
articles.content: SHANGHAI/TAIPEI, Aug 19 (Reuters) - China launched military drills around Taiwan on Saturday as a "serious warning" to separatist forces in an angry but widely expected response to Vice President Wil… [+6974 chars]
